name: KillYourClone
description:
KillYourClone is a game where you are in a colored world and you have to kill your clone, because you are your own enemy for that, you have to find 3 colored bullets to get your weapon and then you have to kill the clone! But be careful! Every 120 seconds, the clone teleports randomly. 

This game requires patience to find the balls

--- Controls ---

-> W A S D / Z Q S D Move

-> Press E to take a colored ball

-> Left click to fire your weapon
